name: Kiribath (Milk Rice - New Year Special)
description: Auspicious milk rice for New Year
instructions: Cook with water until almost done
Add thick coconut milk and salt
Pour onto banana leaf or flat plate
Serve with lunu miris at auspicious time
cultural_notes: Must be made at auspicious time on New Year morning Kiribath is served on all auspicious occasions. Must be eaten with lunu miris (chili sambol) and kithul treacle. Cut in diamond shapes for good luck.
cultural_notes_sinhala: අලුත් අවුරුදු උදෑසන නැකතට කළ යුතුය
cultural_notes_tamil: புத்தாண்டு காலை மங்கள நேரத்தில் செய்ய வேண்டும்
